title: For Gunthewari development regularized under the provisions of Maharashtra Gunthewari Development Act, 2001 and falling in NMRC, seeking provisions for Development / redevelopment, these regulations shall apply
clause_text: For Gunthewari development regularized under the provisions of Maharashtra Gunthewari Development Act, 2001 and falling in NMRC, seeking provisions for Development / redevelopment, these regulations shall apply.
